name: Puzzle Monarch: Zombie
description: Solve 15 sets of ancient puzzles and unlock your way to the bottom of the tomb. Each set contains a three by three and six by six puzzle. To move on to the next level you will have to solve both puzzles and journey deeper into the tomb. Each puzzle is randomly created so you can enjoy replaying with a new experience each play through.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
